title: China-Linked UNC3886 Targets Singapore Telecom Sector in Cyber Espionage Campaign
description: The Cyber Security Agency (CSA) of Singapore on Monday revealed that the China-nexus cyber espionage group known as UNC3886 targeted its telecommunications sector. "UNC3886 had launched a deliberate, targeted, and well-planned campaign against Singapore's telecommunications sector," CSA said.
